mapper.insert: insert into itrip_user (id, userCode, userPassword, userType, flatID, userName, weChat, QQ, weibo, baidu, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy, activated ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flatid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weibo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baidu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{activated,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update itrip_user set userCode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userPassword = #{userpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userType = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flatID = #{flatid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weChat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weibo = #{weibo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baidu = #{baidu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedBy = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, activated = #{activated,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, userCode, userPassword, userType, flatID, userName, weChat, QQ, weibo, baidu, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy, activated from itrip_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, userCode, userPassword, userType, flatID, userName, weChat, QQ, weibo, baidu, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy, activated from itrip_user
select count(*) from itrip_user where userCode= #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
